byline.contributor: Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting from Moscow.

snippet: Syria warned foreign countries on Sunday not to recognize a newly formed opposition group, the Syrian National Council, and threatened to take “strict measures” against any country that does.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Syria warned foreign countries on Sunday not to recognize a newly formed opposition group, the Syrian National Council, and threatened to take “strict measures” against any country that does.

headline.main: Syria Demands That Nations Reject Opposition Council and Protect Its Embassies
headline.print_headline: Syria Demands That Nations Reject Opposition Council and Protect Its Embassies
headline.seo: Syria Warns Countries Not to Recognize Opposition Group
